title: Repository Automation App
description: Desktop App that allows to run scripts on multiple repositories such as npm scripts and git commands.

title: Reddit Analytics
description: React application for searching and analyzing the top 100 posts in a subreddit. The app illustrates the ideal date and time of the week to create a post in a heatmap.

title: Google Books Search
description: Web Application that allows to search books using the Google Books API and saves books to review or purchase later.

title: Workout Tracker
description: Workout Tracker Application that allows tracking of daily workouts and presents a dashboard with weekly progress charts.

title: Budget Tracker
description: Budget Tracker Application that allows tracking of a budget with/without a network connection. It illustrates financial progress in a time frame.

title: Employee Directory
description: This Employee Directory Application generates a list of random users with Random User API and allows sorting and searching users on the list.

title: Burger Logger
description: Burger Logger Web Application that keeps track of Burgers.

title: YouTwitch
description: Video-Sharing platform that combines content from Youtube and Twitch.

title: Password Generator
description: Web App that generates a random password based on user criteria.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This Weather App provides current and future weather forecasts of selected cities.

title: BonAppVoyage
description: Cooking App that obtains a list of food recipes and points of interest of random cities.
